snippet: The T.S.A. is promoting its program for disabled travelers after a clumsy security check involving a 3-year-old girl last month at the St. Louis airport.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes that Transportation Security Administration is aggressively promoting its new program of using specially trained officers to head off unnecessary difficulties involving security screening of disabled travelers.
lead_paragraph: The T.S.A. is promoting its program for disabled travelers after a clumsy security check involving a 3-year-old girl last month at the St. Louis airport.
